H0.text: Heat is the form of energy most lost to the environment.

H1.text: Gravity is the most energy that is lost to the environment.

H2.text: Vapor is the form in which most energy lost to the environment is released.

H3.text: Precipitation is the form in which most of the energy lost to the environment is lost.

A4.text: Latent heat loss, also known as evaporative heat loss, accounts for a large fraction of heat loss from the body.
